content.rendered:
Experience our

Restaurant

A meal at Kings Club’s Restaurant is sure to please any foodie. We are known for our world cuisine inspired in-house restaurants, which offer delicious tasting food and ingenious menus. At our restaurants, you can have romantic dinners or family brunches, drinks in an enchanting atmosphere and a classy atmosphere. Our extensive menu of food & beverage selections is sure to delight the senses & leave them wanting more. King’s Club has something for everyone, whether it’s a mellow multi-cuisine course with a martini or a cuppa with cupcakes that melt in your mouth.

 

The chefs at our restaurant have a great deal of expertise when preparing our dishes. Amidst its impressive menu, you can be sure that you will find something that satisfies your palate at an affordable price. Every time you come to the Club, you will be welcomed by well-behaved staff. Beautifully designed spaces with a calm environment accompany our customers from morning to night at our restaurants. Enjoy the glorious views from our rooftop bar while enjoying cocktails and music.

Sky Lounge

There is a Sky Lounge with Bar & Restaurant in the house of Kings Club. This Roof Garden is great in demand by our Members offered with imported high-quality furniture. The main attraction is that a capacious cinema screen which entertains our Members to view live Cricket and Sports. It has been created with fountains, good landscaping, and a fish aquarium.

Sky Lounge

Kings Restro bar

Kings Restaurant/Restobar is an ideal place for casual or formal dining where you can enjoy a unwind evening with your friends & family away from the noise and crowds of regular lounges. It’s perfectly blending modern & luxurious design with subtle lighting comes with a packed bar with a comprehensive array of exotic cocktails & classic drinks.

Kings Restro bar

Presidential Lounge

Our classy Presidential Lounge has modest furnishings with carved furniture. The lightening effects & interiors are amplifying the ambiance of the Lounge.

Presidential Lounge

Cafe

Our cafes serve a cozy & cheerful atmosphere with a wide variety of coffee, teas, juices, and delectable snacks. It is a classic spot for social gatherings such as birthday parties, kitty parties, & informal get-togethers.

Cafe

Discover

Our Story

ULTIMATE DINING EXPERIENCE LIKE NO OTHER

Our highly skilled chefs prepare our dishes to the highest standards. There is something on its impressive menu that will satisfy your heart at a price that will not break the bank. Each time you visit us, you’ll be greeted by well-behaved staff. 

 

Beautifully designed spaces with a calm environment welcome guests morning to night in our restaurants. The rooftop bar offers stunning views paired with cocktails and music. 

Our Menu

The traditional food of India has been widely appreciated for its fabulous use of herbs and spices. Indian cuisine is known for its large assortment of dishes. The cooking style varies from region to region and is largely divided into South Indian & North Indian cuisine. Kings Club is quite famous for its diverse multi cuisine, South Indian, Asian, North Indian, Biryani, Fast Food & Beverages.

Please wait while flipbook is loading. For more related info, FAQs and issues please refer to DearFlip WordPress Flipbook Plugin Help documentation.

Book Your Table

Our

MASTER CHEF

CHECKOUT OUR RESTAURANT

King’s Club members have access to world-class buffets and multi-cuisines whipped up by highly trained chefs. There are other places where you can get yummy food and drinks. 

In addition, you can have your event, party, or celebration with us. We offer excellent food services, thanks to an expert team of chefs who follow high hygiene standards. 

At Kings Club you will find a tranquil atmosphere, a classy ambiance meant to lighten your mood and space to indulge in your favorite activities

A cozy yet sophisticated social club that surprises by its sheer elegance.....meticulously planned landscape with appreciable amenities......a nice getaway for family........a decent place for small celebrations and ofcourse a nice watering hole for those who are thirsty...... A happening pub with ear teasers for all party animals in the first floor and a happily ever after sky lounge at 3rd floor for licensed drunks who love to share food and wine with their family.... Food is real good and the ambience makes it evn better.. . One of the best things of the club is its dedicated staff......supervisor bishnu makes ur life better by his expert suggestion of the courses and personalized attention.......a must visit place

Girish Aradhya

They were extremely accommodating and allowed us to check in early at like 11am. We got to club room super early and I didn’t wanna wait. So this was a big plus. The sevice was exceptional as well. Would definitely send a friend there.

Gagan C Gowda

Good food and very warm service by minu. Thank you team

Srikanth G

Faq

1. What is it like to visit the Kings Club Restaurant?
Appetizing cuisines & serene atmosphere with classy ambience
2. Is there any discount for Club Members in restaurants?
Yes
3. Do you provide Veg & Non-Veg foods in Club Restaurant?
Yes
4. Do you provide a private dining area in Restaurant?
Yes
5. Can I host a party in Restaurant?
Yes. Of course.
